body:
Thanks@akinlabiatclair. You’re doing something good for a change unlike other filthy spammers. 
I don’t know why I feel Mania down below was being a little sarcastic.
Thank you akinlabistclair, after I finish nutting, I'm drinking water.
I REALLY gotta start reading the damn tags!!
I can't edit or delete comments i was suppose to say "prevents dehydration" my bad, but you get the idea, just trying to spread something positive for once on the site for change

I will say this because i care what happens to you guy's ♡(∩o∩)♡ make sure to drink at least 2 liters of water everyday; why you ask? Well not only is the temperature rising but it's great for your health! It helps with weight loss, dehydration ,thrist and after a night of drinking "hangover's" so take care of yourself and drink water everyday! (๑・ω-)～💧”
When the skin suit is haunted lmao
